name: Project Salvation
description:
During the Second World War, one man witnesses something. After the War, He will find the salvation through his research.

Project Salvation, the old name Project S features point-and-click experience and some puzzle. Therefore, the game is created by historical background, so you will find many histories.

Furthermore, the game sets after The War Ends Sky. It means you will find something related to it throughout playing the game.

Total four chapters with multiple routes and endings.

Further notes: The game is cancelled in order to focus on The War Ends Sky. However, after TWES is finished, I will revive this project. Because it is a direct sequel. The design has been settled already, what I need is something more complicated plan and budget. You can still play the prototype.
